page.title: 07CHELMSFORD CIVIC CENTRE
page.content:
The Civic Centre is situated between Fairfield Road, Coval Lane and Duke Street. The Duke Street frontage is occupied by the{Chelmsford Public } {Library.}Next is the{Civic Theatre,} the smaller{Cramphorn Theatre}and then the{Borough Council ofices.
The Library holds some 300,000 lending books, 15,000 reference books, 12,000 records and tapes and it lends-out about 16,000 items each week. There are 15 Librarians and 14 Library Assistants, 9 part-time.This building was opened in April, 1935, although much of the rest of the Centre complex was built much more recently. The Civic Centre complex is situated next to the{Bus Station}and close to the Railway Station, making access to its facilities easy for those in the outlying areas.
